title: 豆類及豆菜類重金屬限量標準
title_en: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Pulses and Legume Vegetables
short_name: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Pulses and Legume Vegetables
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 廢止法規＞行政院衛生署. Articles extracted: 3.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 本標準依食品衛生管理法第十條規定訂定之。
